about_the_game:
Dive into the exhilarating world of "Top Percent" where the thrill of battle royale meets the festive fun of party games in our unique "Party Royale" genre. This innovative blend offers an unmatched gaming experience, catering to a diverse audience - from the competitive zeal of battle royale enthusiasts to the lighthearted enjoyment of party game fans. Embark on a journey with Top Percent where strategic depth and entertainment collide, ensuring an unforgettable adventure for every player.

.

With a focus on multiplayer action for 2-10 players per lobby, the game promotes both competitive and cooperative play. Choose from different game modes including 'Play with Friends,' 'Play Casual' and 'Play Ranked,' each offering a unique experience. The game is designed to be accessible to newcomers while providing deep strategic gameplay for veterans.

.

Customize your character with a wide range of skins, masks and clothing options while engaging with the community through regularly updated themes, challenges and rewards. Top Percent is not just a game; it's a platform for competition and community with plans for Esports tournaments and a robust ranking system to engage the most skilled players.

.

Do you plan to utilize your strategic foresight, closely watching the frontrunners until a vulnerable moment reveals itself, or will you unleash your full power from the outset, aiming to maintain dominance throughout?

.

Join the adventure in Top Percent and experience the thrill of the Party Royale genre where every match is an adventure and every player has a chance to shine.

.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4690/ AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 3GB/ AMD RX 580 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

Join the fun, beat your foes and rise to the top in "Top Percent" today!
